climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: PLUMP IT UP, LIVE IT UP! - Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan Squalane, Amino Acids and Niacinamide, this moisturizing face cream not only hydrates but actively soothes and repairs.
INSTANT ABSORPTION, ZERO GREASE – Experience a smooth and dewy touch! Our fast-absorbing oil free moisturizer leaves zero residue, letting your natural beauty shine without stickiness.
PURE & UNSCENTED BLISS - Stay confidently fresh without any artificial fragrances. Our fragrance-free formula respects your personal aroma, while being gentle on sensitive skin.
SCIENCE MEETS SUSTAINABILITY - Housed in a paper tube with 80% less plastic, 100% more love for Mother Earth! A face moisturizer that cares for you and the planet.

SAFE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Dermatologist-tested, this face lotion offers worry-free hydration even for those with sensitive skin. EWG-verified, Vegan-certified and Cruelty-free for ethical peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect option for chemical and eco-conscious people
reviews.reviewText: Trying to find plastic free (or as close as I can get) options for moisturizer is surprisingly difficult when you have acne prone and sensitive skin like me. It’s even more difficult when you’re also cautious of chemicals.So when I saw this EWG verified product that tried to minimize the amount of plastic they use and make sure the plastic used is recycled? I had to jump on it! I had tried a solid moisturizer bar meant for acne prone skin and I had break outs 😬 So I’ll use it sparingly now and then I bought this is the replacement to my sample of Pacifica moisturizer that has now run out.I have crazy sensitive skin, but no allergies that I can think of so make sure to read the ingredients just in case. In the past I also had cystic acne that even today threatens to return. I exfoliate a little harder than I should every other day or two and it leaves my skin pretty dry (it always is after a shower).This stuff has been perfect so far though! No reactions, soaks in quick, feels nice and light, no fragrance that I can smell, and leaves my face feeling plump and happy!Of course my skin is different than others, but the price is reasonable for facial moisturizer in my opinion. If you have acne prone skin that is sensitive (but maybe not crazy crazy sensitive) give it a try and do a patch test. :) At worst you’re out only $15!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is kind of expensive, but it works. I used it on a persistently itchy part of my middle back that other lotions could not fix. I used this ONCE and itching gone for a week. It worked like a cortisone based cream. And -- no fragrance with is desirable for me. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Skin felt dry 2 minutes after applying
reviews.reviewText: Not as moisturizing as anticipated. My skin felt dry. Disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great eco friendly product. Too much on the face feels heavy though. I use just a tad and it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally Found the Perfect Product
reviews.reviewText: I am 44 years old with hormonal acne, and it seems that almost any moisturizer I use irritates my skin. However, on a whim and based on ingredients, I tried this product, and I am over two weeks with twice-a-day use, and my skin looks good. It does not make my face greasy feeling and has not caused any breakouts or irritation. I LOVE THIS! I love it so much I am buying it for my 3 sisters!The moisturizer was, as expected, related to thickness and texture and has little to no smell. It feels clean going on and makes my skin look and feel refreshed. Overall, I have never had such good outcomes with a product before, and I have tried a lot of products over my time as a consumer. You only need a pea-sized amount to cover your face and neck, so the value for your money is VERY on point!Y'all, I am impressed and excited to finally have a moisturizer I am happy with and that my skin is happy with also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is very dense that’s why a little goes a long way. Using more than that feels heavy on the skin. That’s probably why the package is not too big. The last one I bought lasted exactly three months, and I used it every night. What I like most is the packaging that is easy to recycle and kind to the environment. I wish more cosmetic products were produced responsibly like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Burned my skin
reviews.reviewText: Maybe I’m allergic, I hope that’s all it is, had to return it and get my money back. I’m a more sensitive skin type so not for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it! Has a fantastic rating with EWG which is why I bought it. I love the packaging and how it is fragrance free.
